description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called ReferralsScreen that allows users to submit a referral code or generate a new one. It manages user input, interacts with the ReferralsService for backend communication, and displays results or errors accordingly.

classes.name: ReferralsScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that provides a UI for submitting or generating referral codes.

classes.name: _ReferralsScreenState
classes.description: The mutable state for ReferralsScreen, managing user input, submission process, and displaying results.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up the TextEditingController before the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the submission of the referral code to the ReferralsService, updates UI based on success or failure.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, including input field, buttons, and displaying referral info or errors.
